sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD) GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR , ERP.BUY_PRICE , ERP.BUY_AMT , TO_CHAR(GAC.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , (SELECT count(*) FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_E WHERE PRT_AT_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND PRT_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND PRT_SUB_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_STAT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT OUTER JOIN EGMISDB.EGMFA1000 ERP ON GAC.ERP_ASSETS_CLS=ERP.ASSET_CLS AND GAC.ERP_ASSETS_NO=ERP.ASSET_NO AND GAC.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=ERP.ASSET_NO_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #sPrprtySeCd#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #sGisAssetsLnm#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #sGisAssetsLnmSub#
ORDER BY ERP.BUY_AMT ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC WHERE 1 = 1
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #sPrprtySeCd#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #sGisAssetsLnm#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #sGisAssetsLnmSub#

SELECT COUNT(*) SUM_CNT , SUM(NVL(GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) SUM_AR , SUM(NVL(ERP.BUY_AMT, 0)) SUM_BUY_AMT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT OUTER JOIN EGMISDB.EGMFA1000 ERP ON GAC.ERP_ASSETS_CLS=ERP.ASSET_CLS AND GAC.ERP_ASSETS_NO=ERP.ASSET_NO AND GAC.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ=ERP.ASSET_NO_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD = #sPrprtySeCd#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsLocplc# || '%'
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM = #sGisAssetsLnm#
AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB = #sGisAssetsLnmSub#
SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM003', gac.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD), SUM(gac.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT) FROM gis_assets_cd_f gac WHERE gac.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' GROUP BY gac.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD
SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM002', gac.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD), SUM(gac.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT) FROM gis_assets_cd_f gac WHERE gac.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' GROUP BY gac.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD
SELECT GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM003', gac.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD), SUM(gac.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT) FROM gis_assets_cd_f gac WHERE gac.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN='Y' GROUP BY gac.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD

SELECT GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT OUTER JOIN EGMISDB.EGMFA1000 ERP ON GAC.ASSET_CLS=ERP.ASSET_CLS AND GAC.ASSET_NO=ERP.ASSET_NO AND GAC.ASSET_NO_SEQ=ERP.ASSET_NO_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'GAM019' AND CODE = GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) AS GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_NAME , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_NM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_AR , GAC.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , PHOTO.PHOTO_SJ , PHOTO.FILENM_PHYSICL , PHOTO.FILENM_LOGIC FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F GAC LEFT JOIN GIS_ASSETS_PHOTO_F PHOTO ON GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = PHOTO.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND ROWNUM=1

SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019', G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE) PRT_AT_CODE_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , C.ENTRPS_CNT , C.USAGE_AR , C.FEE , C.RDCXPT_FEE , CASE WHEN NVL(C.USAGE_AR,0) > 0 AND NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) > 0 THEN (NVL(C.USAGE_AR,0) / NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) ELSE 0 END USAGE_RATIO , (SELECT count(*) FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_E WHERE PRT_AT_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND PRT_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND PRT_SUB_CD=G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_STAT
FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) SUM_AR , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) SUM_RENT_AR , SUM(C.USAGE_AR) SUM_USAGE_AR , SUM(C.FEE) SUM_FEE , SUM(C.RDCXPT_FEE) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
TO_DATE(#searchDate#,'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN B.USAGE_PD_FROM AND B.USAGE_PD_TO+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#

SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT ML.MONTHS, SUM(UPBS.FEE) MONTH_FEE, SUM(UPBS.RDCXPT_FEE) MONTH_RDCXPT_FEE FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR((SELECT MIN(USAGE_PD_FROM) FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = '620' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD = 'SNQ' AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = '01'), 'YYYYMM'), 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL - 1 ),'YYYYMM') AS MONTHS FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT MONTHS_BETWEEN(MAX(USAGE_PD_TO), MIN(USAGE_PD_FROM)) FROM ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd#) + 1) ML, USAGE_PD_BY_STATS_F UPBS WHERE UPBS.PRT_AT_CODE = #gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND UPBS.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #gisAssetsCd# AND UPBS.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = #gisAssetsSubCd# AND ML.MONTHS=UPBS.USAGE_YEAR||UPBS.USAGE_MT GROUP BY ML.MONTHS ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT Z.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , C.FEE , C.RDCXPT_FEE , (SELECT count(*) FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_E WHERE PRT_AT_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND PRT_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND PRT_SUB_CD=GAC.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD) GIS_STAT FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
B.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
B.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
ORDER BY G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) S ) Z WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
B.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
B.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(COUNT(*),0), '999,999,999,999')) SUM_CNT , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR) SUM_AR , SUM(G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR) SUM_RENT_AR , SUM(C.USAGE_AR) SUM_USAGE_AR , SUM(C.FEE) SUM_FEE , SUM(C.RDCXPT_FEE) SUM_RDCXPT_FEE FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, COUNT(A.ENTRPSCD) ENTRPS_CNT, SUM(B.FEE) FEE, SUM(B.RDCXPT_FEE) RDCXPT_FEE, SUM(B.USAGE_AR) USAGE_AR FROM ASSETS_RENT_F A, ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F B WHERE A.PRT_AT_CODE = B.PRT_AT_CODE AND A.MNG_YEAR = B.MNG_YEAR AND A.MNG_NO = B.MNG_NO AND A.MNG_CNT = B.MNG_CNT
A.ENTRPS_NM LIKE '%' || #sEntrpsNm# || '%'
B.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#,'yyyy-mm-dd')
B.USAGE_PD_TO < TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1
GROUP BY B.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, B.GIS_ASSETS_CD, B.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD ) C ON C.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND C.GIS_ASSETS_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND C.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD WHERE 1=1
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = #searchGisAssetsPrtAtCode#
